PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15462017-12-11INAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of WILTON LITTLECHILD, C.M., Q.C., of Maskwacis, Alberta as a special adviser to the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, to serve as Chairperson of the Interim Board for the establishment of the National Council for Reconciliation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of six months, effective December 11, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of WILTON LITTLECHILD, C.M., Q.C., of Maskwacis, Alberta as a special adviser to the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, to serve as Chairperson of the Interim Board for the establishment of the National Council for Reconciliation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of six months, effective December 11, 2017.
